# Battleship Game Project

## Project Overview
Complete Python battleship game with tkinter GUI, ship placement, turn-based gameplay against AI, and win/loss conditions.

## Project Structure
- `battleship.py` - Main game file with GUI and game logic
- `README.md` - Instructions and documentation

## Features
- Graphical interface with tkinter
- Manual and automatic ship placement
- 5 different ship types
- Turn-based gameplay
- Computer AI opponent
- Visual hit/miss indicators
- Win/loss detection

## How to Run
```bash
python battleship.py
```
